720485f-a.text:
153 to 157 Hudson Street, adjoining and north of the N.W. corner of
Hubert Street.
About 1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
720485f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Hubert Street, Manhattan, NY

720484f-c.text:
(1)
Hudson Street, west side, south from Hubert, to and including Beach Street, as viewed southwesterly across the former depot site from Varick Street. Indistinctly shown on the left, appears buildings on the south side of Ericsson Place (Beach Street), west from Varick Street (not shown).
December 5, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
A 1imited view; and showing only the west side of Hudson Street,
between Hubert (right) and Beach (left) Streets.
December 5, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

(3)
The same as No. 2.
December 5, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

720484f-b.folder: Hudson Street & Hubert Street, Manhattan, NY

720483f-b.text:
(1)
149 to 135 Hudson Street, west side, south from Hubert, to Beach Streets. This block of houses, with the exception of Nos. 137 and 135, the two 6-story buildings (seen on extreme left) were demolished; on their site now (1937) stands the 14-story Green Industrial Building.
March 7, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A portion of the same, showing only Nos. 145 to 139.
March 7, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
